title: Vaccines
description: Every year, vaccination saves up to 5 million lives worldwide. Find out more about Sanofi and vaccination.
cleaned_text: Vaccines Help Protect Us Every year, vaccination saves up to 5 million lives around the world. But an additional 1.5 million lives could be saved with improved vaccination coverage.1 Our Vaccines at a Glance 500 million + people vaccinated annually with our vaccines worldwide. 2.5 million vaccines doses supplied every day. A leader in influenza and pediatrics vaccines. Dream Big Vaccines help protect us from diseases so that we can focus on the future. So we can appreciate the little things that make our day and dream about the big ones that rock our world. Discover dreams of people from all walks of life.
